comment: Anyway to elaborate on using the Lemongrass? You say 6 each, are you meaning stalks? Did you cut them up and drop them in the secondary? Haven't really used it before but would really like to make a beer like this.

I just saw this. I haven't brewed this yet and I was going off of some stuff I read so I can't give you specifics. I would assume stalks and some rough chopping wouldn't hurt.
Let me know if you have brewed this and how it went.
